name: Working From Home (oldboysagat)
description:
Try not to get fired as you attempt to balance hunger, boredom and productivity during a typical day working from home.

Keys:

Movement: Arrow keys

Interact: Spacebar

Guide:

You wake up at 8.50am and have to make it to 5:00pm without your Hunger, Tired, and Work meters from depleting.

you do your work at the computer. But, before starting you need to make a coffee.

Go into the Kitchen and press spacebar at the sink. The Coffee will appear at your bedside table.  Coffee is how you keep your Tired meter from depleting

Now you should be able to interact with your computer.  Doing this will fill up your Work meter a little bit.
